div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2035 Castagneto, near Teramo, 24 km. (215) SSE of Ascoli Piceno, Picenum, 1912 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Crawford) Contents: 51 AE Aesernia: 3 Neapolis: 1 Teanum?: 1 Unc.: 11 Roman Rep.: 35 (see Crawford) Disposition: Teramo Savini, Rivista Abruzzese 1912, p. 221 Thomsen, ERC I, p. 116 Crawford, RRCH 77
